text.text_translated:
A freelancer works for different people. They are their own boss.
I am a freelancer. I work for myself. This makes me very happy. I control my work. I control my time.

First, I worked at home. But it was very hard to focus on work. Many things stopped me. I saw cleaning the house. I wanted more tea. My family wanted me for many things.

So I went to a cafe near my home. I worked there. But the internet was not very good. I drank too much coffee.

A co-working space is a place. Many people work there. They share desks.
In the end, I paid to use a desk. It was in a co-working space. Five other freelancers worked there too. I liked to put on clothes for work. I liked to go to work in the morning. I could focus on my work there. It felt like a real office.
